text: Malcolm Christian Lang (born 14 January 1941) is an English former professional footballer who played as a winger in the Football League for York City, and in non-League football for Bridlington Trinity. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Barnsley Category:English footballers Category:Association football wingers Category:Bridlington Trinity F.C. players Category:York City F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Malcolm Lang (footballer)
